msbt.message: This island is so comfy, I could stay here for a long old time. Hey! Maybe I will, !
This island smells kinda like where I grew up. It's like this whole island is my old bedroom, .
I really like this island place! I'm gonna look for a place like this place the next time I move, .
This island is so comfy, I could stay here for a long old time. Hey! Maybe I will, !
This island smells kinda like where I grew up. It's like this whole island is my old bedroom, .
I really like this island place! I'm gonna look for a place like this place the next time I move, .
The best thing 'bout camping is the eating. Ya ever look at outdoors stuff while you eat? It's a real good time.
Laying on the floor at home is fun But laying on the ground in the dirt is fun too! Hooray for camping!

Wanna hear about the science experiment I did?Well, first I went inside and I sucked indoor air up my left nose hole to fill my left lung with indoor air.Then I went outdoor and sucked outdoor air into my right nose hole and filled up that lung!Outdoor air feels real amazing! I'm gonna go exhale now and refill 'em both with outdoor air!
The food is definitely the best part about camping.Everything tastes better if ya eat it outside. I proved it by doing science with my mouth and tummy.
Sometimes I set up a tent in my living room and camp out. But this is pretty fun too.
Hi there! Are you from this island? I'm here camping.Do you camp? You gotta try it sometime. It's like being inside, except you're outside, !
It's a buncha fun camping on this island. The air smells good, like food. I wanna bite it, !
I'm on a camping trip, trying to meet good food.What's the island specialty? Fruits? Fish? Shellfish? Fishfruit? Fruitshells? Those ALL sound good! I'll take one of each, .
Man, thanks a bunch for inviting me!
Thanks for the call! I'm real happy you invited me, !
I'm here to hang out. Thanks for the invite, .
Hiii, called me, so I rolled on over.
invited me over, and I like going placesso, hi!
I'm here 'cause called me!
Man, isn't this tent great? It's a real easy one that ya pull outta your pocket and pop right upThe hard part's when I gotta go home. It's real hard to fold up!I don't think I can do it alone,

I try real hard to make sure I don't forget anything when I go camping.I've got my tent, jammies, pillow, blankie, and my stuffed best friend, Bugface, for cuddling.I got my potato chips, tomato chips, pickle chips, shrimp chips, chocolate chips, spicy chipsI got everything I need to be comfy except for my TV.<10_4 /> I FORGOT MY TV! Oh man. I can't breathe! Ohhh man.
Camping food is all about s'mores! Chocolate, graham crackers, and a toasty marshmallow!Man, I wish I could eat s'mores at home. Too bad there's no way to toasty a marshmallow without fire.
Man, isn't this tent great? It's a real easy one that ya pull outta your pocket and pop right upThe hard part's when I gotta go home. It's real hard to fold up!I don't think I can do it alone,

I try real hard to make sure I don't forget anything when I go camping.I've got my tent, jammies, pillow, blankie, and my stuffed best friend, Bugface, for cuddling.I got my potato chips, tomato chips, pickle chips, shrimp chips, chocolate chips, spicy chipsI got everything I need to be comfy except for my TV.<10_4 /> I FORGOT MY TV! Oh man. I can't breathe! Ohhh man.
Camping food is all about s'mores! Chocolate, graham crackers, and a toasty marshmallow!Man, I wish I could eat s'mores at home. Too bad there's no way to toasty a marshmallow without fire.

You can hear way more outside noises in a tent than in a houseAnd I can hear way more house noises when I'm in a tent inside instead of outside.But I never hear tent noisesno matter where I put it.<10_4 /> Sometimes science is weird, .
The best thing about camping is making new friends in new lands!I met a new bug friend today, and I invited them to bring their family over for snacks later!

I gotta think of a real cool way to do my new house. I wanna make it so cool that everyone wants to visit! It'll be the fifteenthird wonder of the world, ! Folks'll be allI wonder why he glued that there? I wonder why this tastes funny? I wonder why that's on fire?And that's just the first three wonders!
Well, if I'm moving here, I gotta start packing as soon as I get home.I guess I oughta say "old home" since this is my new home!
A new life on a new island It's real exciting. Man, real exciting. I dunno if I can sleep tonight, !

Guess what! I got important news! I'm moving to this island! invited me! , next time we meet, we're gonna be neighbors!I can't wait! I'll say, "Hi, neighbor," and you'll say, "Hi, neighbor," and we'll be neighbors, !
I'm gonna be moving to this island real soon, 'cause invited me!Once I move here, I hope we can chat, and snack, and hang out lots, and be good friends, .
invited me to move to this island and I said sure. I got nothing else going on.We're gonna be neighbors, and that's pretty neat, .
Man, I'm gonna be moving to this island, and I couldn't be happier!
Big news! Big, big news! The biggest of big, big news! I'm moving here!I wanna hang out every day, and eat snacks, and be chill, and always have fun, .

! I got a thing to say, but ya gotta promise ya won't freak out, OK?I'm gonna move to this island! We're gonna be neighbors!I'm real excited to smell all the smells this place has got. If ya know any good ones, let me know!
I've only been here a day, but I love this island almost as much as peanut butter chocolate chip cookies.I hope I get to live on an island like this one day, !
Move here!
I hope you do too!

I picked this as the place to go after I threw a handful of jelly at a map and it mostly splatted here.Camping sounded like more fun than cleaning up my map, so I came here!This place doesn't have jelly maps, but it has real nice folks. I'm not ready to go home tomorrow.
Come live here!
Have a good flight...
I came to camp on this island 'cause I had a dream that I lived here and I had fun every day.Whaddaya think about my dream, ?
Let's make it a reality!
Come back any time!
Thanks! I know if I keep camping around, I'm gonna find the perfect island, .
Yeah, I'm gonna go back home and see about cleaning up that jelly. I hope we can meet again!
I will! It was a good dream, and the real island is even better, .
's got it all.Nice folks, cool stuff, great snacks, and friendly bugsI could stay here forever!
You should stay.
Come back any time.
The folks on made me a buncha souvenirs, and it made me so happy.What a neat island with some real neat folks! I almost don't wanna leave, !
Why not move here?
I'm glad you had fun.
I was looking at my souvenir and I got to thinkin'It'd be real cool if I could hang out here and make stuff with you guys. Just, ya know, all the time.Like, ALL the time. If I lived here.
You should live here.
But...you don't.
I will! Maybe I'll tell my friends they should come here too. This island's cool, but our place is special too!
Thanks. Yeah, time to head for home. My friends'd be sad if I didn't come back!
Yeah, I've got a place I call home already. And I can make some pretty cool furniture on my island! Maybe I can show you if you come visit someday, .
